name: CELEBRITY
notes:
Based on the Dutch 16m2. The first CELEBRITY's were imported from Holland by Evanson Boat Co. Construction was stip-planked mahogany with spruce spars. (Molded plywood after 1960)
Both centerboard and keel models were offered with a transom mounted rudder. 
Draft for fixed keel verson: 2.92'. Disp.: 1100 lbs.
At some time in the 1950's, the design was changed to include an inboard, skeg mounted rudder. 
By 1972, Evanson was building it's own all fiberglass version.
In 1986, Class builder became  Hampton Shipyard in East Quogue, NY 
Last known builder:
Southport Island Marine
Southport ME, (USA)
